name: manner

manner noun
(WAY)

B2 [ S ] the way in which something is done: She stared at me in an accusing manner. He was elected in the normal manner. It was the manner of her death that stuck in the public's mind. in the manner of something
in the style of something: Her latest film is a suspense thriller very much in the manner of Hitchcock.

manner noun
(BEHAVIOUR)
B2 [ S ] the usual way in which you behave towards other people, or the way you behave on a particular occasion: She has a somewhat cold, unfriendly manner. As soon as he realized that we weren't going to buy anything, his whole manner changed.
